0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH TO PROVIDE SIGN LANGUAGE INTERPRETERS DURING THEIR MEDIA BRIEFINGS ON COVID-19 TO CATER TO THE DEAF COMMUNITY IN THE COUNTRY

FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH TO PROVIDE SIGN LANGUAGE INTERPRETERS DURING THEIR MEDIA BRIEFINGS ON COVID-19 TO CATER TO THE DEAF COMMUNITY IN THE COUNTRY
